trans: n. 数据（datum的复数）；资料 n. (Data)人名；(日)驮太 (姓)；(印、葡)达塔

sentences.english: The research involves collecting data from two random samples.
sentences.chinese: 该项研究需要从两个随机样本里收集资料。

detailed_translations.english: information or facts
information or facts

name: guess
trans: vt. 猜测；认为；推测；猜中 vi. 猜；推测；猜中 n. 猜测；推测 n. (Guess)人名；(英)格斯；(德)居斯

sentences.english: I’d say he’s around 50, but I’m only guessing.
sentences.chinese: 我想他50岁左右，不过也只是猜测。

sentences.english: What star sign are you? No, let me guess.
sentences.chinese: 你是什么星座的？别说，让我来猜猜看。

sentences.english: I’d say she’s about 35, but that’s only a guess.
sentences.chinese: 我说她大约35岁，不过那只是猜测。

detailed_translations.english: to try to answer a question or form an opinion when you are not sure whether you will be correct
an attempt to answer a question or make a judgement when you are not sure whether you will be correct

name: temperature
trans: n. 温度；体温；气温；发烧

sentences.english: The temperature of the water was just right for swimming.
sentences.chinese: 这水温游泳正好。

sentences.english: Water boils at a temperature of 100˚C.
sentences.chinese: 水在100摄氏度沸腾。

sentences.english: The nurse took (= measured ) my temperature .
sentences.chinese: 护士给我量了体温。

detailed_translations.english: a measure of how hot or cold a place or thing is

name: allowance
trans: n. 津贴，零用钱；允许；限额 vt. 定量供应

sentences.english: Sales staff get a generous mileage allowance or a company car.
sentences.chinese: 销售人员有优厚的里程补贴或者公司提供的专用汽车。

sentences.english: If you are entitled to sickness allowance, you must claim it from your employer.
sentences.chinese: 你如果有资格领取疾病津贴，必须向雇主申请索要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 津贴， 补贴； 零用钱
detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you are given regularly or for a special purpose

name: budget
trans: n. 预算，预算费 vt. 安排，预定；把…编入预算 vi. 编预算，做预算 adj. 廉价的

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

name: charity
trans: n. 慈善；施舍；慈善团体；宽容；施舍物

sentences.english: Several charities sent aid to the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 有几家慈善机构已向洪灾灾民送去了救援物资。

detailed_translations.english: an organization that gives money, goods, or help to people who are poor, sick etc

name: expense
trans: n. 损失，代价；消费；开支 vt. 向…收取费用 vi. 被花掉

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

name: expensive
trans: adj. 昂贵的；花钱的

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.english: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.english: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.chinese: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.english: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.english: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.english: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

detailed_translations.english: costing a lot of money

name: raise
trans: vt. 提高；筹集；养育；升起；饲养，种植 vi. 上升 n. 高地；上升；加薪 n. (Raise) （意、法、英、美）雷兹（人名）

sentences.english: He did not raise the subject again.
sentences.chinese: 他再也没有提起这个话题。

sentences.english: I’d like to raise the issue of publicity.
sentences.chinese: 我想提一提宣传问题。

sentences.english: Betty raised the important question of who will be in charge.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂提出了一个重要问题，就是将由谁来负责。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to talk or write about a subject that you want to be considered or a question that you think should be answered

name: savings
trans: n. 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）

sentences.english: You can enjoy a year's membership for just $28 – a saving of $7 off the regular rate.
sentences.chinese: 你只需花$28就可以享受一年的会员资格–比正常会费节省了$7。

detailed_translations.chinese: 储蓄；存款；救助；节省物（saving的复数形式）
detailed_translations.english: A saving is a reduction in the amount of time or money that is used or needed

name: candidate
trans: n. 候选人，候补者；应试者

sentences.english: a presidential candidate
sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.english: Candidates are not allowed to use a calculator in this exam.
sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

name: election
trans: n. 选举；当选；选择权；上帝的选拔

sentences.english: The Labour Party won the 2001 election by a huge majority.
sentences.chinese: 工党在2001年选举中以巨大优势获胜。

sentences.english: Elections for the state governorship will be on November 25.
sentences.chinese: 州长选举将于11月25日举行。

detailed_translations.english: when people vote to choose someone for an official position

name: government
trans: n. 政府；政体；管辖

sentences.english: The Government are planning further cuts in public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府正计划进一步削减公共支出。

sentences.english: The US government has tightened restrictions on firearms.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府已经加强了对枪支的管制。

sentences.english: Neither party had the majority necessary to form a government.
sentences.chinese: 两个政党都没有获得组阁所必需的多数票。

sentences.english: strong government
sentences.chinese: 强有力的统治

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who govern a country or state

name: president
trans: n. 总统；董事长；校长；主席

sentences.english: President Bush
sentences.chinese: 布什总统

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人
detailed_translations.english: the official leader of a country that does not have a king or queen

name: registration
trans: n. 登记；注册；挂号

sentences.english: Student registration (= for a course of study ) starts the first week in September.
sentences.chinese: 学生注册在9月份的第一个星期开始。

sentences.english: The registration fee is $75.
sentences.chinese: 注册费是75美元。

detailed_translations.english: the act of recording names and details on an official list

name: responsibility
trans: n. 责任，职责；义务

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

name: coronavirus
trans: n. 冠状病毒；日冕形病毒

name: decorate
trans: vt. 装饰；布置；授勋给 vi. 装饰；布置

sentences.english: The bathroom is decorated in green and yellow.
sentences.chinese: 浴室里是用绿色和黄色装潢的。

sentences.english: We plan to spend the weekend decorating.
sentences.chinese: 我们计划用这个周末来装修。

detailed_translations.english: to paint the inside of a room, put special paper on the walls etc

name: spread
trans: vi. 传播；伸展 vt. 传播，散布；展开；伸展；铺开 n. 传播；伸展 adj. 伸展的

sentences.english: The cancer had spread to her liver.
sentences.chinese: 癌已经扩散到她的肝脏。

sentences.english: The news spread like wildfire.
sentences.chinese: 消息如野火般迅速传开。

detailed_translations.english: if something spreads or is spread, it becomes larger or moves so that it affects more people or a larger area

name: argue
trans: vi. 争论，辩论；提出理由 vt. 辩论，争论；证明；说服 n. (Argue)人名；(英、法)阿格

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way
to persuade someone to do or not do something

name: constitution
trans: n. 宪法；体制；章程；构造；建立，组成；体格

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.english: She’s got a strong constitution – she’ll recover in no time.
sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

name: miserable
trans: adj. 悲惨的；痛苦的；卑鄙的

sentences.english: I’ve been so miserable since Pat left me.
sentences.chinese: 自从帕特离我而去后，我十分痛苦。

sentences.english: I spent the weekend feeling miserable .
sentences.chinese: 我那个周末心情很糟糕。

sentences.english: Jan looks really miserable .
sentences.chinese: 简看上去很痛苦。

sentences.english: Why do you make yourself miserable by taking on too much work?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么揽这么多活儿，把自己弄得很辛苦呢？

detailed_translations.english: extremely unhappy, for example because you feel lonely, cold, or badly treated

name: represent
trans: vt. 代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送 vi. 代表；提出异议

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

name: sign
trans: n. 迹象；符号；记号；手势；指示牌 vi. 签署；签名 vt. 签署；示意

sentences.english: the dollar sign
sentences.chinese: 美元符号

sentences.english: a minus sign
sentences.chinese: 减号

sentences.english: a sign on the door
sentences.chinese: 门上的标牌

sentences.english: Sign here, please.
sentences.chinese: 请在这里签字。

detailed_translations.english: a mark or shape that has a particular meaning
to write your signature on something to show that you wrote it, agree with it, or were present

name: bury
trans: vt. 埋葬；隐藏 n. (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

sentences.english: Electric cables are buried beneath the streets.
sentences.chinese: 电缆埋在街道的下面。

detailed_translations.english: to put someone who has died in a  grave

detailed_translations.chinese: (Bury)人名；(法)比里；(英、西)伯里；(德、意、罗、波、捷、匈)布里；(俄)布雷

name: rumbling
trans: n. 隆隆声，辘辘声；怨声，传言 adj. 隆隆声的，辘辘声的；（争吵）无休止的 v. 隆隆作响；轰鸣着缓慢行进；低沉地说；（非正式）看穿（阴谋）；（非正式）打群架（rumble 的现在分词）

name: snowdrift
trans: n. 随风飘飞的雪；被风刮在一起的雪堆

sentences.english: Weller was once a stranded motorist himself. Driving in an Illinois blizzard when he was 16, he got stuck in a snowdrift.
sentences.chinese: 韦勒自己曾经也是一个无助驾驶员，在他16岁的时候驾驶在伊利诺斯州的暴风雪中，陷入了雪堆。

sentences.english: This snow had decided to go on falling until everything was a single, vast wet snowdrift, and nobody would remember what had been underneath it.
sentences.chinese: 雪决定继续下，下到所有的东西都变成一个孤零零的，巨大湿雪堆，没有人能记得下面曾是什么。

sentences.english: No sense fretting about taking down the 5-foot Christmas tree buried in a snowdrift on her deck in Brookfield, Conn.
sentences.chinese: 当她从位于康涅狄格州布鲁克菲尔德的自家平台上拆下埋在雪里的5英尺高圣诞树时也不用烦恼了。

detailed_translations.english: a deep mass of snow formed by the wind

name: Thanksgiving
trans: n. 感恩

sentences.english: He said sometimes they would invite some friends to share the happiness of Thanksgiving Day.
sentences.chinese: 他说有时候他们也会邀请一些朋友来一起分享感恩节快乐。

sentences.english: I hear about these people every Thanksgiving, then never think about them again for the next 364 days.
sentences.chinese: 我在每个感恩节都听说过这群人，而后在接下来的364天，就再也没有想起过他们。

sentences.english: It compares with "Cyber Monday" in the US - the day after Thanksgiving marketed as a big online shopping day.
sentences.chinese: 它与“网络星期一”在美国，感恩节后的第一天销售作为一个大型网上购物一天。

detailed_translations.english: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc

name: wail
trans: vi. 哀号；悲叹 vt. 为某人死亡而悲痛；哀悼某人；哀号着说 n. 哀号；悲叹；恸哭声 n. (Wail)人名；(阿拉伯)瓦伊勒；(英)韦尔

sentences.english: The women began to wail in mourning.
sentences.chinese: 女人们开始大放悲声。

sentences.english: Wails of grief were heard as visitors filed past the site of the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 当来访者们列队走过灾难现场时听见阵阵悲痛的哀号声。

detailed_translations.english: If someone wails, they make long, loud, high-pitched cries which express sorrow or pain
Wail is also a noun

name: advise
trans: vt. 建议；劝告，忠告；通知；警告 vi. 建议；与…商量

sentences.english: She needed someone to advise her.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.english: ‘Make sure that you keep the documents in a safe place,’ Otley advised him.
sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

sentences.english: Keep us advised of (= continue to tell us about ) any new developments.
sentences.chinese: 请随时告诉我们任何新的进展情况。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone what you think they should do, especially when you know more than they do about something

name: babble
trans: v. 含糊不清地说；喋喋不休；（不自觉或不小心）泄露机密；（水流过石块）潺潺作响 n. 嘈杂的人声；含糊不清的话；胡言乱语；行话；（水流的）潺潺声；（幼儿）咿呀学语声；电信（集扰）

sentences.english: Similar to us, birds learn to sing by mimicking the adults, and the early chirps are akin to a baby's babble.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，鸟类通过模仿长者学习鸣叫，最开始鸣叫时类似于婴儿的牙牙学语。

sentences.english: If your child often has a pacifier in his mouth, he may be less likely to babble and practice talking, or the pacifier may distort his speech.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的宝宝经常含着奶嘴，那这样可能会减少宝宝牙牙学语，练习说话的机会，或者奶嘴可能会搅乱他的言语发展。

name: furious
trans: adj. 激烈的；狂怒的；热烈兴奋的；喧闹的

sentences.english: She was absolutely furious .
sentences.chinese: 她怒不可遏。

sentences.english: There was a furious row over the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 关于这些提议的争论非常激烈。

detailed_translations.english: very angry

name: snatch
trans: v. 一把抓起；夺去；抓紧时间做；反败为胜；（非正式）偷；急切地接受（邀请或机会） n. （歌曲或谈话的）片段；抢夺；（举重）抓举；片刻；（非正式）绑架；（女性的）阴部

sentences.english: I snatched a glance at the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 我乘机瞥了一眼镜子。

detailed_translations.english: If you snatch an opportunity, you take it quickly. If you snatch something to eat or a rest, you have it quickly in between doing other things.

detailed_translations.chinese: 夺，夺走，抢走；一下子拉，一把抓住；抓住机会做，抽空做
detailed_translations.english: to take something away from someone with a quick, often violent, movement
a short part of a conversation, song etc that you hear

name: stash
trans: n. 藏匿处；藏匿物 vt. 存放；贮藏 vi. 存放；藏起来

sentences.english: We went for the bottle of whisky that we had stashed behind the bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 我们去取那瓶我们藏在书柜后面的威士忌。

detailed_translations.english: to store something secretly or safely somewhere
an amount of something that is kept in a secret place, especially money, weapons, or drugs

name: tortilla
trans: n. 玉米粉薄烙饼，玉米粉圆饼

name: chemical
trans: n. 化学制品，化学药品 adj. 化学的

sentences.english: the chemical composition of bleach
sentences.chinese: 漂白剂的化学成分

sentences.english: a chemical analysis of the soil
sentences.chinese: 对土壤的化学分析

sentences.english: synthetic chemicals
sentences.chinese: 合成化学品

detailed_translations.english: relating to substances, the study of substances, or processes involving changes in substances
relating to substances, the study of substances, or processes involving changes in substances

name: comfort
trans: n. 安慰；舒适；安慰者 vt. 安慰；使（痛苦等）缓和

sentences.english: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.english: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.english: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.english: Whenever he was upset, he would turn to her for comfort and advice.
sentences.chinese: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.english: He longed to take her in his arms and comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them

name: detection
trans: n. 侦查，探测；发觉，发现；察觉

sentences.english: ...the early detection of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: …乳腺癌的早期发现。

detailed_translations.english: when something is found that is not easy to see, hear etc, or the process of looking for it

name: disability
trans: n. 残疾；无能；无资格；不利条件

sentences.english: Facilities for people with disabilities are still insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 供残疾人使用的设施仍然不足。

detailed_translations.chinese: 残疾；无能；无资格；不利条件
detailed_translations.english: A disability is a permanent injury, illness, or physical or mental condition that tends to restrict the way that someone can live their life

name: medicine
trans: n. 药；医学；内科；巫术 vt. 用药物治疗；给…用药

sentences.english: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.english: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.chinese: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.english: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.chinese: 现代医学的非凡成就

detailed_translations.english: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink

name: spasm
trans: n. [临床] 痉挛；抽搐；一阵发作

sentences.english: Maggie felt a muscle spasm in her back.
sentences.chinese: 玛吉觉得背部肌肉一阵抽搐。

sentences.english: Tom’s jaw muscles had gone into spasm .
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的颌部肌肉开始抽搐。

detailed_translations.chinese: [临床] 痉挛；抽搐；一阵发作
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when your muscles suddenly become tight, causing you pain

name: altar
trans: n. 祭坛；圣坛；圣餐台 n. (Altar)人名；(法、塞、罗)阿尔塔

sentences.english: a crucifix above the high altar
sentences.chinese: 主圣坛上方的耶稣受难像

sentences.english: The victim was tied to a sacrificial altar.
sentences.chinese: 牺牲被绑在祭坛上。

detailed_translations.english: a holy table or surface used in religious ceremonies

name: gravestone
trans: n. 墓碑，墓石

name: marigold
trans: n. 万寿菊；金盏花 n. (Marigold)人名；(英)玛丽戈尔德

name: beam
trans: n. 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆 vt. 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露 vi. 照射；堆满笑容 n. (Beam)人名；(阿拉伯)贝亚姆；(英)比姆

sentences.english: ...high-energy laser beams.
sentences.chinese: …高能激光束。

detailed_translations.chinese: 横梁；光线；电波；船宽；[计量] 秤杆
detailed_translations.english: a long heavy piece of wood or metal used in building houses, bridges etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 发送；以梁支撑；用…照射；流露
detailed_translations.english: to send a radio or television signal through the air, especially to somewhere very distant

name: construct
trans: v. 建造，修建（某物，尤指建筑物，公路，机器）；组成，创建；（按照数学规则）编制，绘制；形成（观念，理论） n. 构想，概念；编造，杜撰；（短语的）结构成分，结构体；建造物，构筑物

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

name: elevator
trans: n. 电梯；升降机；升降舵；起卸机

sentences.english: We’ll have to take the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好坐电梯了。

detailed_translations.english: a machine that takes people and goods from one level to another in a building

name: rivet
trans: n. 铆钉 vt. 铆接；固定；（把目光、注意力等）集中于 n. (Rivet)人名；(法)里韦；(英、西)里韦特

sentences.english: The property parameters of stainless steel, full steel sealed type blind rivet .
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢、 全钢封闭型抽芯铆钉的性能参数图。

sentences.english: Every nail driven should be as another rivet in the machine of the universe, you carrying on the work.
sentences.chinese: 钉入的每颗钉子，都应像宇宙机器中的铆钉一样固定，你的工作才能继续下去。

sentences.english: When an aluminum rivet is upset against a softer material, a washer must be used under the upset head to prevent eruption of the softer material.
sentences.chinese: 当一个铝铆钉的镦头形成在较软的材料一边时，必需在铆钉镦头下使用垫片以防止较软材料胀裂。

detailed_translations.english: a metal pin used to fasten pieces of metal together

name: skyscraper
trans: n. 摩天楼，超高层大楼；特别高的东西

sentences.english: The skyscraper towers into the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 那幢摩天大楼高耸入云。

sentences.english: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me .
sentences.chinese: 这幢摩天大厦的雄伟气势令我惊叹。

sentences.english: Suddenly, a top needle of a skyscraper is pressing toward him. He fails to dodge and bumps heavily on the concrete needle.
sentences.chinese: 突然，一座摩天大厦的尖型顶柱朝他逼来，他躲避不及，重重地撞在混凝土顶柱上。

detailed_translations.english: a very tall modern city building

name: steel
trans: n. 钢铁；钢制品；坚固 vt. 钢化；使冷酷 adj. 钢制的；钢铁业的；坚强的 n. (Steel)人名；(德)施特尔；(英)斯蒂尔

sentences.english: a steel bridge
sentences.chinese: 钢铁大桥

sentences.english: stainless steel(= steel that does not change colour ) knives
sentences.chinese: 不锈钢小刀

detailed_translations.english: strong metal that can be shaped easily, consisting of iron and  carbon

name: breeding
trans: n. 繁殖；饲养；教养；再生 v. 生产；培育；使…繁殖（breed的ing形式） n. (Breeding)人名；(英)布里丁

name: California
trans: n. 加利福尼亚（美国一个州）

sentences.english: California borders the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州与太平洋毗连。

sentences.english: She lived in California during the winter.
sentences.chinese: 整个冬天她住在加利福尼亚州。

sentences.english: Many people prospected for gold in California in the 1850s.
sentences.chinese: 19世纪50年代许多人在加利福尼亚勘探金矿。

name: condor
trans: n. 秃鹫，秃鹰 n. (Condor)人名；(法、西、罗)孔多尔

sentences.english: Just like this California condor, which—though teetering on the edge of extinction—still soars near the Grand Canyon in Arizona and in the state it was named after.
sentences.chinese: 就像加利福利亚秃鹫，虽然依旧翱翔于亚利桑那和加利福利亚的大峡谷附近，但已在灭绝的悬崖边摇摇欲坠。

sentences.english: An Andean condor fliesover the Colca canyon at the Colca valley in Arequipa, south of Lima, on January 30, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 2011年1月30日，利马南部城市阿雷基帕的科尔卡大峡谷，一直安第斯秃鹰正在展翅飞翔。

sentences.english: One example is the California condor.
sentences.chinese: 有一个加利福尼亚秃鹫的例子。

detailed_translations.english: a very large South American  vulture (= a bird that eats dead animals )

name: endangered
trans: adj. 濒临灭绝的；有生命危险的

sentences.english: I think there are many endangered animals in the world, such as tigers and pandas.
sentences.chinese: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.english: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.english: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的

name: extinct
trans: adj. 灭绝的，绝种的；熄灭的 vt. 使熄灭

sentences.english: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.chinese: 恐龙已灭绝数千万年了。

sentences.english: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.chinese: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.english: an extinct species
sentences.chinese: 已灭绝的一个物种

detailed_translations.english: (of a type of plant, animal, etc.) no longer in existence

name: confusion
trans: n. 混淆，混乱；困惑

sentences.english: a scene of indescribable confusion
sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.english: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

detailed_translations.english: a very confusing situation, that usually has a lot of noise and action, so that it is difficult for someone to understand it or control it

name: float
trans: v. 使漂浮，浮动；漂流，飘动；飘移；安排（贷款）提出，提请考虑（想法或计划）；发行（股票）上市；（货币汇率）自由浮动实行 n. （酒吧等用于给顾客找零的）备用零钱；彩车，花车；浮板；漂浮物；鱼漂；浮子；加冰激凌的饮料；浮动期；坐浮箱（治病、疗伤或放松）；救生圈 n. (Float)（美、英、德）弗洛特（人名）

sentences.english: I looked up at the clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望着天上的浮云。

sentences.english: Leaves floated gently down from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 叶子从树上轻轻飘落。

detailed_translations.english: if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air

detailed_translations.chinese: 彩车，花车；漂流物；浮舟；浮萍
detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that is decorated to drive through the streets as part of a special event

name: parade
trans: n. 游行；阅兵；炫耀；行进；阅兵场 vt. 游行；炫耀；列队行进 vi. 游行；炫耀；列队行进 n. (Parade)人名；(法、德)帕拉德

sentences.english: a victory parade
sentences.chinese: 胜利游行

sentences.english: the St Patrick’s Day parade
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克节庆祝游行

sentences.english: a military parade
sentences.chinese: 军事检阅

sentences.english: The marchers paraded peacefully through the capital.
sentences.chinese: 游行队伍有秩序地列队穿过首都。

detailed_translations.english: a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street
to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something

name: route
trans: n. 路线，航线；道路，公路；（交通工具的）固定路线；巡访；途径，渠道；（北美）递送路线；用于美国干线公路号码前 v. 按特定路线发送，为……规定路线

sentences.english: Trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.chinese: 火车正在运送过去由卡车运送的大批货物。

detailed_translations.english: to send something somewhere using a particular route
a way from one place to another

name: thrust
trans: v. 插；插入；推挤；插入；用向某人刺去；猛然或用力推；伸展；强使接受；竖起，挺出 n. 推力；刺；要旨，重点；强攻；冲断层，逆断层；苛评

sentences.english: He jumped back to avoid another thrust of the knife.
sentences.chinese: 他往后一闪，躲避再次捅来的一刀。

sentences.english: She thrust her way into the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 她挤进了人群。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden strong movement in which you push something forward
If you thrust your way somewhere, you move there, pushing between people or things which are in your way

name: firefighter
trans: n. 消防队员

sentences.english: When every molecule in your body tells you to run away from the burning building, as a firefighter you have to resist the urge, override it and plunge in.
sentences.chinese: 当你身体内每个细胞都告诉逃离失火的建筑物时，作为一名消防员，你必须克制这种冲动，超越它，投入火场进行战斗。

sentences.english: He mows lawns and gardens for half a dozen clients in Grafton, some of them family friends. And he is an active volunteer firefighter.
sentences.chinese: 他为格拉夫顿六户人家修剪草坪和花园，他们中一些是父母的朋友，此外他还是个积极的义务消防员。

sentences.english: Locally and from the state standpoint, we had some firefighter jobs that were in jeopardy, up in the hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 站在州政府的立场，我们有一些消防员在危险岗位工作，最多时有数百人。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to stop fires burning

name: fuel
trans: n. 燃料；刺激因素；（为身体提供能量的）食物 vt. 给……提供燃料；刺激，煽动；推动 vi. 得到燃料 n. (Fuel) （美）傅爱乐（人名）

sentences.english: Coal is one of the cheapest fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤是最廉价的燃料之一。

detailed_translations.english: a substance such as coal, gas, or oil that can be burned to produce heat or energy
if you fuel a vehicle, or if it fuels up, fuel is put into it

name: machine
trans: n. 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人 vt. 用机器制造 n. (Machine)人名；(意)马基内

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

name: oxygen
trans: n. [化学] 氧气，[化学] 氧

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

name: pump
trans: n. 泵；泵送；无带浅帮女鞋；平底轻便鞋 v. 抽吸；喷出；注入；射向目标；打气；（非正式）盘问；剧烈上下晃动；让……使用大量药物；洗胃；增加数值 n. (Pump) （美、俄、印、泰、加）蓬普（人名）

sentences.english: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.chinese: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.english: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.english: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.chinese: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

detailed_translations.english: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump

name: spray
trans: n. 喷雾，喷雾剂；喷雾器；水沫 vt. 喷射 vi. 喷 n. (Spray)人名；(英)斯普雷

sentences.english: spray from the waves
sentences.chinese: 海浪溅起的水雾

sentences.english: a new hair styling spray
sentences.chinese: 一种新的定型喷发剂

sentences.english: Most farmers use pesticide sprays.
sentences.chinese: 大多数农民都使用喷雾杀虫剂。

sentences.english: She sprayed herself with perfume.
sentences.chinese: 她往身上喷了香水。

detailed_translations.english: water in very small drops that is blown from the sea etc or sent up by vehicles on a wet road
to force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area

name: ability
trans: n. 能力，能耐；才能

sentences.english: the ability to walk
sentences.chinese: 行走的能力

sentences.english: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.chinese: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being able to do something

name: habitat
trans: n. [生态] 栖息地，产地 n. (Habitat)人名；(德)哈比塔特

sentences.english: watching monkeys in their natural habitat
sentences.chinese: 观察自然生活环境中的猴子

sentences.english: The grassland is an important habitat for many wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这片草原是很多野花的重要生长地。

detailed_translations.english: the natural home of a plant or animal

name: rodent
trans: n. 啮齿目动物（如老鼠等） adj. （与） 啮齿动物（有关）的

sentences.english: This is an actual monster, some sort of rodent-like creature with a dinosaur beak.
sentences.chinese: 这真的是怪兽，有点像啮齿动物，但长着恐龙一样的嘴巴。

sentences.english: But the new  study found that 70 percent of rodent and primate groups have species with an appendix.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这项新的研究发现，70%的啮齿动物和灵长目动物的物种具有阑尾。

sentences.english: Like Plasmodium, which cycles between mosquitoes and man, Toxoplasma cycles between its rodent and feline hosts, living out different phases of its existence in each.
sentences.chinese: 像疟原虫在蚊子和人之间循环一样，弓形虫的循环界于其啮齿类和猫科宿主之间，在不同宿主体内活出不同的生存阶段。

detailed_translations.chinese: 啮齿类的；咬的，嚼的；侵蚀性的

detailed_translations.english: any small animal of the type that has long sharp front teeth, such as a rat or a rabbit

name: ax
trans: v. 削减，删除；用斧修整；解雇；询问 n. 斧头；爵士乐器（尤指吉他或萨克斯管） n. (Ax) （德、芬）阿克斯（人名）

sentences.english: He grinds ax on the grindstone.
sentences.chinese: 他在磨石上磨斧。

sentences.english: How do you sharpen your ax?
sentences.chinese: 如何磨尖你的斧头呢？

sentences.english: Again he wielded his ax.
sentences.chinese: 他再次挥舞了他的斧头。

name: beanstalk
trans: n. 豆茎

name: cure
trans: v. 缓解（人或动物）的疾病症状，治疗；治愈；解决（问题）；（用腌、晒、熏等方法）加工处理，保存（肉、鱼、烟草、兽皮）；被硫化，使硬化；凝固，养护 n. 药物；疗法，治疗；治愈；对策；（对橡胶、塑料或其他材料的）熟化；（基督教牧师的）牧师责任（或责任区）；教区 n. (Cure) （美、法）楚雷（人名）

sentences.english: Will you be able to cure him, Doctor?
sentences.chinese: 医生，你能把他治好吗？

sentences.english: The new treatment effected a miraculous cure.
sentences.chinese: 这种新疗法产生了奇迹般的疗效。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or an animal healthy again after an illness
the act of making someone well again after an illness

name: heal
trans: vt. 治愈，痊愈；和解 vi. 痊愈 n. (Heal)人名；(英)希尔

sentences.english: a preacher who claims that he can heal the sick
sentences.chinese: 自称可以治病的传道士

sentences.english: The rift between the two younger men never healed.
sentences.chinese: 两个较年轻者之间的裂痕从未得以弥合。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone who is ill become healthy again, especially by using natural powers or prayer

name: topple
trans: vi. 倾倒；倒塌；摇摇欲坠 vt. 推翻；颠覆；使倒塌 n. (Topple)人名；(英)托佩尔

sentences.english: He just released his hold and toppled slowly backwards.
sentences.chinese: 他就松手，慢慢地向后倒下了。

detailed_translations.english: to become unsteady and then fall over, or to make something do this

name: trade
trans: n. 贸易，交易；行业；职业 vi. 交易，买卖；以物易物 vt. 用……进行交换

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

name: burrow
trans: v. 挖地洞，挖通道；依偎；挖穿；钻入；（使）……钻到……下面；（在……里）搜寻；深入查询 n. （动物的，尤指兔子挖的）洞穴，地洞 n. (Burrow) （美）伯罗（人名）

sentences.english: Normally timid, they rarely stray far from their burrows.
sentences.chinese: 它们通常很胆小，极少远离自己的洞穴。

sentences.english: The larvae burrow into cracks in the floor.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫钻进地板的裂缝中。

detailed_translations.english: a passage in the ground made by an animal such as a rabbit or  fox  as a place to live
If an animal burrows into the ground or into a surface, it moves through it by making a tunnel or hole

name: gloomy
trans: adj. 黑暗的；沮丧的；阴郁的

sentences.english: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。

sentences.chinese: 她身穿白色真丝礼服，看上去光彩照人。

sentences.chinese: 一朵云挡住了阳光，房间暗了下来。

sentences.chinese: 地中海沿岸的国家

sentences.chinese: …地中海沿岸的欧洲国家和阿拉伯国家。

A country that borders another country, a sea, or a river is next to it

name: harmony
trans: n. 协调；和睦；融洽；调和 n. (Harmony)人名；(英)哈莫尼

sentences.chinese: 《墨西哥玫瑰》的精彩和声演唱

sentences.english: three-part harmonies
sentences.chinese: 三部和声

detailed_translations.english: notes of music combined together in a pleasant way

name: mortar
trans: n. 灰泥，砂浆；迫击炮，迫击炮弹；研钵，臼 v. 用灰泥涂抹，结合；用迫击炮攻击（或袭击）

sentences.chinese: 于是他们用砖代替石头，沥青代替灰泥。

sentences.chinese: 即便是最天花乱坠的科幻小说、最荒唐无稽的恐怖小说和最错综复杂的间谍小说也都用这些元素作为粘合叙述的灰泥。

sentences.chinese: 阿尔及利亚以前是法国的殖民地。

trans: n. [昆] 外骨骼

sentences.chinese: 一种最先进的机载微型电脑确保了外骨骼与操作器一致移动。

sentences.chinese: 他计划要为外骨骼添加再生能源的能力，使得平地的运行能耗损很少能源或甚至不耗损能源。

sentences.chinese: 和其他企鹅一样，它也经历一年一次的脱毛，在几周时间里替换掉所有的羽毛。

name: nocturnal
trans: adj. 夜的；夜曲的；夜间发生的

sentences.english: Hamsters are nocturnal creatures.

trans: n. 食腐动物；清道夫；[助剂] 清除剂；拾荒者

sentences.chinese: 他用绑在桨的一头的刀子击中了其中的一条，并看着这条食腐动物滑到深海里去了。

sentences.chinese: 人们移居到雅加达这样的城市找工作。

sentences.chinese: 大多数的鸟类不得不飞行很长的距离进行迁徙。

sentences.chinese: 冬季常常粮食短缺。

sentences.english: There was fierce competition for the scarce resources .
sentences.chinese: 对这些紧缺资源的争夺非常激烈。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺乏的， 不足的； 稀少的， 罕见的

sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

sentences.chinese: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.chinese: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.chinese: 再生材料

sentences.chinese: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.chinese: 重视物质回报的社会

sentences.english: The grand canyon was not dug by the hand of man, but riven by nature.
sentences.chinese: 大峡谷并非人力所开而是受大自然之力而成的。

sentences.chinese: 我们沿着固定的绳索前进，然后到达了一个更深的峡谷，这已经是第三个了。

sentences.chinese: 缺少具体证据的

sentences.chinese: 有关具体事情和问题的对话

name: electricity

sentences.chinese: 那个农场非常偏远，但有电力供应。

detailed_translations.english: the power that is carried by wires, cables etc, and is used to provide light or heat, to make machines work etc

name: grout

sentences.chinese: 一个国家的妇女通过她们的生活方式塑造了这个国家的道德、宗教和政治。

sentences.chinese: 她把布揉成一团扔了。

sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.chinese: 最近股市的下跌预示着未来将有麻烦。

sentences.chinese: 最后的费用可能高达十亿美元。

sentences.english: Belinda greeted her warmly.

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

name: idiom
trans: n. 成语，习语；土话

sentences.english: ..familiar idioms and metaphors, such as "turning over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: …如“翻开新的一页”这样熟悉的习语和比喻。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words that has a special meaning that is different from the ordinary meaning of each separate word. For example, ‘under the weather’ is an idiom meaning ‘ill’.

name: nervous
trans: adj. 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

name: relief
trans: n. 救济；减轻，解除；安慰；浮雕

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

name: success
trans: n. 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物

sentences.english: The experiment was a big success.
sentences.chinese: 实验非常成功。

detailed_translations.chinese: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
detailed_translations.english: when you achieve what you want or intend

name: lobe
trans: n. （脑、肺等的）叶；裂片；耳垂；波瓣 n. (Lobe)人名；(西)洛韦；(德、喀)洛贝

sentences.english: ...damage to the temporal lobe of the brain.
sentences.chinese: ...对大脑颞叶的损伤。

detailed_translations.english: the soft piece of flesh at the bottom of your ear

name: mammal
trans: n. [脊椎] 哺乳动物

sentences.english: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸是一种哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The whale is a mammal.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼是哺乳动物。

sentences.english: The problem with that theory is that no other mammal has resorted to this method of cooling down.
sentences.chinese: 这一理论的问题在于，没有其他的哺乳动物采取了这种降低体温的方式。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal that drinks milk from its mother’s body when it is young. Humans, dogs, and whales are mammals.

name: pollution
trans: n. 污染 污染物

sentences.english: California’s tough anti-pollution laws
sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州严厉的反污染法

detailed_translations.english: the process of making air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use, or the state of being dangerously dirty

name: reptile
trans: n. 爬行动物；（非正式）卑鄙的人 adj. 爬行动物的；卑鄙的

sentences.english: Bird evolved from reptiles, so the first bird must have come out of an egg--laid by a reptile.
sentences.chinese: 禽类是由爬虫类进化而来，所以，第一只禽鸟肯定是从爬虫类孵化的蛋里出来的。

sentences.english: No matter how dry your skin gets, you will never turn into an alligator or any other type of reptile.
sentences.chinese: 不论皮肤多么干燥，你永远不会变成美洲鳄或任何其他一种皮肤粗糙的爬行动物。

sentences.english: This small reptile, which measures just 10 centimeters long, can swim through the sand dunes at up to 15 centimeters per second.
sentences.chinese: 这种身长只有10厘米小型爬行动物，可以在沙子中以最快每秒15厘米的速度游动。

detailed_translations.english: a type of animal, such as a snake or  lizard  , whose body temperature changes according to the temperature around it, and that usually lays eggs to have babies

name: concentrate
trans: vi. 集中；浓缩；全神贯注；聚集 vt. 集中；浓缩 n. 浓缩，精选；浓缩液

sentences.english: Now please concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 现在请集中注意力。

sentences.english: Adrian was finding it difficult to concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 阿德里安觉得自己很难集中注意力。

sentences.english: Italian industry is concentrated mainly in the north.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的工业主要集中在北部。

sentences.english: orange juice made from concentrate
sentences.chinese: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

detailed_translations.english: to think very carefully about something that you are doing

name: making
trans: n. 发展；制造；形成 v. 制作（make的现在分词）

sentences.english: He admits that a lot of his troubles are entirely of his own making.
sentences.chinese: 他承认他的许多麻烦完全是他自己造成的。

detailed_translations.english: the process of making something

name: recruit
trans: v. 征募；聘用；通过招募组建；补充；（非正式）说服；（使）恢复健康 n. 招聘；新兵；新成员

sentences.english: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.chinese: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.english: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.chinese: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

sentences.english: Drill sergeants have eight weeks to turn fresh recruits into soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 操练军士要在八个星期之内把新兵训练成真正的士兵。

detailed_translations.english: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
someone who has just joined the army, navy, or  air force

name: witness
trans: n. 证人；目击者；证据 vt. 目击；证明；为…作证 vi. 作证人 n. (Witness)人名；(津)威特尼斯

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

name: bill
trans: n. [法] 法案；广告；账单；[金融] 票据；钞票；清单 vt. 宣布；开账单；用海报宣传

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

name: communicate
trans: vi. 通讯，传达；相通；交流；感染 vt. 传达；感染；显露

sentences.english: We communicated mostly by e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要是用电子邮件沟通。

sentences.english: A baby communicates its needs by crying.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿用哭来表达需要。

detailed_translations.english: to exchange information or conversation with other people, using words, signs, writing etc

name: crest
trans: n. [物] 波峰；冠；山顶；顶饰 vi. 到达绝顶；形成浪峰 n. (Crest)人名；(法)克雷

sentences.english: exotic birds with colourful crests
sentences.chinese: 羽冠鲜艳多彩的珍禽

detailed_translations.english: the top or highest point of something such as a hill or a wave
to reach the top of a hill or mountain

name: mimic
trans: vt. 模仿，摹拟 n. 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑 adj. 模仿的，模拟的；假装的

sentences.english: He could mimic all the teachers’ accents.
sentences.chinese: 他能模仿所有老师的口音。

sentences.english: ‘I’m so sorry,’ she mimicked.
sentences.chinese: “很抱歉。”她学着说道。

detailed_translations.english: to copy the way someone speaks or behaves, especially in order to make people laugh

detailed_translations.chinese: 效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑

name: rainforest
trans: n. （热带）雨林

sentences.english: The rainforest is essential in other areas also.
sentences.chinese: 雨林在其他地区也是必不可少的。

sentences.english: The rainforest around our house sometimes brings forth intriguing creatures like this.
sentences.chinese: 我们的房子周围的雨林有时带来了这样有趣的生物。

sentences.english: Then we carried on in the worst conditions yet: low, tangled rainforest that blocked out the light, and mud up to our thighs.
sentences.chinese: 那时我们还在最糟糕的环境里行进着：低矮、纷乱的雨林遮住了阳光，泥浆没至我们的大腿。

name: reason
trans: n. 理由；理性；动机 vi. 推论；劝说 vt. 说服；推论；辩论 n. (Reason)人名；(英)里森

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

name: beaded
trans: adj. 饰以珠的；带着小滴液体的；挂着汗珠的

sentences.english: a beaded dress
sentences.chinese: 一条缀有珠子的连衣裙

detailed_translations.chinese: 以珠装饰的， 珠状的
detailed_translations.english: A beaded dress, cushion, or other object is decorated with beads

name: burst
trans: v. 爆炸；戳破；爆裂；（器官或血管）爆裂；装满；充满感情；突然爆发（某种感情）；爆发出；冲开；闯；分页，断纸 n. 爆炸；猝发；迸发；冲刺；一阵短促的射击 n. (Burst) （美）布尔斯特（人名）

sentences.english: The pipes had burst and the house was under two feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 水管爆裂，房子被水淹了两英尺。

sentences.english: a sudden burst of activity/energy/anger/enthusiasm
sentences.chinese: 活动 / 能量 / 怒火 / 热情的迸发

detailed_translations.english: if something bursts, or if you burst it, it breaks open or apart suddenly and violently so that its contents come out
the act of something bursting or the place where it has burst

name: gasp
trans: vi. 喘气；喘息；渴望 vt. 气喘吁吁地说；喘着气说话 n. 喘气

sentences.english: ‘My leg!’ he gasped. ‘I think it’s broken!’
sentences.chinese: “我的腿！”他倒抽一口气喊道，“我觉得腿断了！”

detailed_translations.english: to breathe in suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain
when you take in a breath suddenly in a way that can be heard, especially because you are surprised or in pain

name: glance
trans: v. 瞥闪，瞥见，扫视，匆匆一看；浏览；斜击某物后斜弹开来；反光；轻擦（球）；（板球）斜击 n. 一瞥；一滑；闪光；（板球）斜击；辉金属 n. (Glance) （美、俄、澳）格兰斯（人名）

sentences.english: Wyatt glanced around the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 怀亚特环视了一下餐馆。

sentences.english: Emily glanced over her shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉回头看了一眼。

sentences.english: He gave her a quick glance and smiled.
sentences.chinese: 他迅速地瞥了她一眼，笑了。

detailed_translations.english: to quickly look at someone or something
a quick look

name: photographer
trans: n. 摄影师；照相师

sentences.english: a fashion photographer
sentences.chinese: 时装摄影师

detailed_translations.english: someone who takes photographs, especially as a professional or as an artist

name: stain
trans: vt. 玷污；败坏；给…着色 vi. 污染；被玷污；被染污 n. 污点；瑕疵；着色剂

sentences.english: We’ve decided to stain the shelves blue.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把架子涂成蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to change the colour of something, especially something made of wood, by using a special liquid
a mark that is difficult to remove, especially one made by a liquid such as blood, coffee, or ink

name: awe
trans: n. 敬畏，惊叹；（古）使人敬畏的力量 v. 使敬畏，使赞叹 n. (Awe) （美、尼日利亚、英、德）阿韦（人名）

sentences.english: The girls were awed by the splendour of the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 女孩们对大教堂的宏伟气势大为惊叹。

detailed_translations.english: if you are awed by someone or something, you feel great respect and liking for them, and are often slightly afraid of them
a feeling of great respect and liking for someone or something

name: bounty
trans: n. 慷慨；丰富；奖励金；赠款 vt. 发给…奖金等；为…而发给赏金 vi. 以赏金等形式发放

sentences.english: People came from all over the world to enjoy America’s bounty.
sentences.chinese: 人们从世界各地而来，享受美国的富足。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given to someone by the government as a reward for doing something, especially catching or killing a criminal

detailed_translations.chinese: 发给…奖金等；为…而发给赏金

name: cheer
trans: n. 欢呼，喝彩声；愉快，欢乐的气氛；让人开心的理由；加油歌，加油诗；（喜庆场合供应的）酒菜 v. 欢呼，加油；安慰，鼓舞；（使）高兴起来 n. (Cheer) （美、英、加、澳）舍尔（人名）

sentences.english: Everybody cheered when the firemen arrived.
sentences.chinese: 消防员到达时，大家都欢呼起来。

sentences.english: The audience was shouting and cheering.
sentences.chinese: 观众在呐喊欢呼。

sentences.english: The spectators cheered him wildly.
sentences.chinese: 观众拼命为他加油。

detailed_translations.english: to shout as a way of showing happiness, praise, approval, or support of someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事
detailed_translations.english: a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement

name: complain
trans: vi. 投诉；发牢骚；诉说 vt. 抱怨；控诉

sentences.english: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.chinese: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.english: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.chinese: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.english: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone

name: cove
trans: n. 小湾；山凹；小峡谷 vt. 使内凹；使成拱形 vi. 内凹；成拱形 n. (Cove)人名；(英)科夫

name: plenty
trans: n. 丰富，大量；充足 adj. 足够的，很多的 adv. 足够 n. (Plenty)人名；(英)普伦蒂

sentences.english: There’s plenty to do and see in New York.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约有很多事可做，很多东西可看。

detailed_translations.english: a large quantity that is enough or more than enough

name: geography
trans: n. 地理；地形

sentences.english: a geography lesson
sentences.chinese: 地理课

detailed_translations.english: the study of the countries, oceans, rivers, mountains, cities etc of the world

name: heave
trans: vt. 举起；使起伏；投掷；恶心；发出（叹息等） vi. 起伏；举起；喘息；呕吐 n. 举起；起伏；投掷；一阵呕吐

sentences.english: Michael’s shoulders heaved with silent laughter.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔憋着不笑出声来，双肩直抖。

sentences.english: The sea heaved up and down beneath the boat.
sentences.chinese: 船的下面大海波涛汹涌。

detailed_translations.english: to move up and down with very strong movements

detailed_translations.chinese: 举起，提起，拉起，拖；扔；发出
detailed_translations.english: to pull or lift something very heavy with one great effort

detailed_translations.chinese: 举起； 起伏， 升降
detailed_translations.english: a strong rising or falling movement

name: literature
trans: n. 文学；文献；文艺；著作

sentences.english: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.chinese: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.english: Italian literature
sentences.chinese: 意大利文学

sentences.english: literature on the history of science
sentences.chinese: 科学史的文献资料

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学，文学作品；文献；文献
detailed_translations.english: books, plays, poems etc that people think are important and good

name: substitute
trans: n. 代用品；代替者 vi. 替代 vt. 代替

sentences.english: Germany brought on a substitute at half time.
sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper
sentences.chinese: 替补守门员

detailed_translations.english: someone who does someone else’s job for a limited period of time, especially in a sports team or school
to use something new or diffe-rent instead of something else

name: thump
trans: v. 捶击；猛力地移动；重步走；怦怦直跳；（非正式）彻底击垮 n. 捶击；重击声；心脏怦怦跳动声

sentences.english: If you don’t shut up, I’m going to thump you!
sentences.chinese: 你要是不住嘴，我就揍你！

sentences.english: She thumped the table with her fist.
sentences.chinese: 她挥拳砸在桌子上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重击；用拳头打；砰地撞到
detailed_translations.english: to hit someone very hard with your hand closed
the dull sound that is made when something hits a surface

name: treasure
trans: n. 财富，财产；财宝；珍品 vt. 珍爱；珍藏 n. (Treasure)（英、美、爱）特雷热（人名）

sentences.english: buried treasure
sentences.chinese: 埋藏的财宝

sentences.english: the priceless art treasures of the Uffizi gallery.
sentences.chinese: 乌菲齐美术馆收藏的无价艺术瑰宝

sentences.english: I treasure his friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我珍重他的友谊。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of valuable things such as gold, silver and jewellery
to keep and care for something that is very special, important, or valuable to you

name: crowded
trans: adj. 拥挤的；塞满的 v. 拥挤（crowd的过去分词）

sentences.english: a crowded room
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的房间

sentences.english: a crowded street
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的街道

sentences.english: The train was very crowded, and we had to stand.
sentences.chinese: 火车很挤，我们只好站着。

detailed_translations.english: too full of people or things

name: entertain
trans: vt. 娱乐；招待；怀抱；容纳 vi. 款待

sentences.english: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.english: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure

name: frustrated
trans: adj. 懊恼的，沮丧的；无效的，没有得到满足的；失意的，不得志的；（性欲）被抑制的 v. 挫败；阻挠（frustrate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: He gets frustrated when people don’t understand what he’s trying to say.
sentences.chinese: 人们不懂他在说什么时，他就会很懊丧。

sentences.english: The government has deliberately frustrated his efforts to gain work permits for his foreign staff.
sentences.chinese: 政府蓄意挫败了他为其外国员工取得工作许可证的努力。

detailed_translations.english: someone who wants to develop a particular skill but has not been able to do this

detailed_translations.chinese: 挫败；阻挠（frustrate的过去式和过去分词形式）
detailed_translations.english: If someone or something frustrates a plan or attempt to do something, they prevent it from succeeding

name: lobby
trans: n. 大厅；休息室；会客室；游说议员的团体 vt. 对……进行游说 vi. 游说议员

sentences.english: a hotel lobby
sentences.chinese: 宾馆大堂

sentences.english: I’ll meet you in the entrance lobby.
sentences.chinese: 我们在入口大厅见。

sentences.english: The group is lobbying for a reduction in defence spending.
sentences.chinese: 该团体正在游说政府削减国防开支。

detailed_translations.english: a wide passage or large hall just inside the entrance to a public building
to try to persuade the government or someone with political power that a law or situation should be changed

name: scold
trans: vi. 责骂；叱责 vt. 骂；责骂 n. 责骂；爱责骂的人

sentences.english: Do not scold the puppy, but simply and firmly say ‘no’.
sentences.chinese: 不要责骂小狗，但要干脆利落地说“不”。

detailed_translations.english: to angrily criticize someone, especially a child, about something they have done

name: prairie
trans: n. 大草原；牧场

sentences.english: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.chinese: 大约有160种珍稀鸟类栖息在这里的沼泽地和大草原上。

sentences.english: How many an afternoon antinia and i have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence .
sentences.chinese: 有多少个下午，我同安东妮亚在大草原上这种壮丽的景色中慢慢地走着啊！

sentences.english: From your English garden variety to your prairie wildflower, floral prints tell a sweet story.
sentences.chinese: 从英式花园的百花齐放到大草原的野花儿，印花叙述着甜美的故事。

detailed_translations.english: a wide open area of fairly flat land in North America which is covered in grass or wheat

name: angle
trans: n. 角，角度；视角；立场；角铁；（古）鱼钩 v. 斜移；从……角度提供信息；钓鱼；谋取

sentences.english: You didn’t measure the angle accurately.
sentences.chinese: 你没有量准角度。

detailed_translations.english: the space between two straight lines or surfaces that join each other, measured in degrees

name: experiment
trans: n. 实验，试验；尝试 v. 尝试；试验；进行实验

sentences.english: The teacher provided some different materials and left the children to experiment.
sentences.chinese: 老师提供了几种不同的材料让孩子们试验。

detailed_translations.english: to try using various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are
a scientific test done to find out how something reacts under certain conditions, or to find out if a particular idea is true

name: illusion
trans: n. 幻觉，错觉；错误的观念或信仰

sentences.chinese: 她不再幻想他爱她了。

sentences.english: It is an illusion that the Arctic is dark in winter.
sentences.chinese: 认为北极冬天一片黑暗是错误的。

sentences.english: She had no illusions about her physical attractiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她对自己外表的吸引力不抱幻想。

sentences.english: ‘I hate to shatter your illusions,’ he said.
sentences.chinese: “我不愿意打破你的幻想。”他说。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幻想， 错误的观念； 错觉， 幻觉， 假象
detailed_translations.english: an idea or opinion that is wrong, especially about yourself

name: indigo
trans: n. 靛蓝，靛蓝染料；靛蓝色；槐蓝属植物 adj. 靛蓝色的

sentences.chinese: 他说，醋可以使靛蓝变稳定，防止牛仔裤褪色。

sentences.english: The indigo plant was highly valued until the discovery of chemical dyes in the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 植物靛蓝在当时的欧洲非常昂贵，直到19世纪化学染料的出现。

detailed_translations.chinese: 靛蓝，靛蓝染料；靛蓝色；槐蓝属植物
detailed_translations.english: a dark purple-blue colour

name: reflect
trans: vt. 反映；反射，照出；表达；显示;反省 vi. 反射，映现；深思

sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

name: care
trans: n. 关怀；照料；谨慎；忧虑 vi. 照顾；关心；喜爱；顾虑 vt. 在意；希望或喜欢 n. (Care)人名；(英)凯尔；(塞)察蕾

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

name: ranch
trans: n. 大农场；大牧场 vi. 经营牧场；在牧场工作 vt. 经营牧场；在牧场饲养…

sentences.english: He lives on a cattle ranch in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 他住在德克萨斯州的一个养牛的大牧场里。

detailed_translations.english: a very large farm in the western US and Canada where sheep, cattle, or horses are bred

name: squint
trans: vi. 眯眼看；斜视；窥视；偏移 vt. 使斜眼；眯眼看 n. 斜视；斜孔小窗；一瞥 adj. 斜视的；斜的

a condition of your eye muscles that makes each eye look in a slightly different direction

name: stall

sentences.chinese: 别拖延时间，快回答我的问题！

sentences.english: He was just stalling for time .
sentences.chinese: 他只是在拖延时间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 熄火； 拖延， 推迟
detailed_translations.english: to deliberately delay because you are not ready to do something, answer questions etc

name: cartilage
trans: n. 软骨

sentences.chinese: 安德烈·阿加西胸部软骨拉伤后已退出了下周的大满贯赛事。

detailed_translations.english: a strong substance that can bend, which is around the joints in your body and in your outer ear

name: dinosaur
trans: n. 恐龙；过时、落伍的人或事物

sentences.chinese: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.english: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.english: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

trans: n. 象；大号图画纸

sentences.english: A trunk distinguishes the elephant.
sentences.chinese: 长鼻是象的特征。

sentences.chinese: 不，尽管这种纸里75％的原料都是大象的粪便，但它不但不臭，反而有一种淡淡的清香，这是源于它的特殊的制造工艺。

sentences.chinese: 我/你/我们/他们喜欢长颈鹿。

sentences.english: So they sent me a … giraffe!
sentences.chinese: 于是他们又送我一只…长颈鹿。

sentences.english: Can I get the mommy giraffe for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 我在圣诞节能得到一个长颈鹿妈妈吗？

trans: n. 猴子；顽童 vi. 胡闹；捣蛋 vt. 嘲弄

sentences.chinese: 那只猴子到处乱窜。

sentences.chinese: 这只猴子囫囵吞下食物。

sentences.english: The monkey had deflowered an entire section of the garden.
sentences.chinese: 这只猴子把花园中一整块地方的花都糟蹋了。

trans: n. 霍加皮（一种非洲鹿，复数okapi）

trans: n. [脊椎] 穿山甲；[鱼] 鲮鲤

sentences.chinese: 我看见过一个大海龟。

sentences.chinese: 像乌龟一样慢慢跑。

sentences.chinese: 无论如何，野兔和乌龟得到什么都是基于它们的行为举止的。

sentences.chinese: 在学习伪装技术的士兵

trans: n. 雪地鞋（snowshoe的复数） v. 穿着雪鞋行走（snowshoe的三单形式）

Whine is also a noun

sentences.chinese: 那本书摊开放在他的书桌上。

sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

detailed_translations.english: to fall or be moved suddenly in a particular direction, or to make someone or something do this

name: sensitive
trans: adj. 敏感的；感觉的；[仪] 灵敏的；感光的；易受伤害的；易受影响的 n. 敏感的人；有灵异能力的人

sentences.english: a very sensitive child
sentences.chinese: 一个很敏感的小孩

sentences.english: a highly sensitive electronic camera

name: vibrate

sentences.chinese: 气流通过我们的声带，使之产生振动。

detailed_translations.english: if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements
if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements

sentences.chinese: 请你把音量调大好吗？

sentences.english: The volume of the container measures 10,000 cubic metres.
sentences.chinese: 这个容器的容量是1万立方米。

sentences.chinese: 1940年至1945年这段时间在第9卷。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of sound produced by a television, radio etc

sentences.chinese: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

name: inject

sentences.chinese: 他的儿子被注射了强效的药。

detailed_translations.english: to put liquid, especially a drug, into someone’s body by using a special needle

name: parachute

sentences.chinese: 跳伞

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment fastened to the back of people who jump out of planes, which makes them fall slowly and safely to the ground
to jump from a plane using a parachute

name: poisonous

sentences.chinese: 一些蘑菇有剧毒。

sentences.english: poisonous gases such as hydrogen sulfide
sentences.chinese: 硫化氢等有毒气体

sentences.english: poisonous substances
sentences.chinese: 有毒物质

sentences.english: She was bitten on the ankle by a poisonous snake .
sentences.chinese: 她被毒蛇咬了脚踝。

detailed_translations.english: containing poison or producing poison

sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

name: ban

sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

sentences.chinese: 这是一笔意料之财呢，还是你本来就知道会有的？

sentences.chinese: 那头猪尖叫着站起来，飞快地跑开了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 螺栓，螺钉；闪电，雷电；门闩；弩箭;（布的）一匹，一卷

detailed_translations.chinese: 筛选；囫囵吞下；（把门、窗等）闩上；突然说出，脱口说出
detailed_translations.english: to lock a door or window by sliding a bolt across

detailed_translations.chinese: 突然地；像箭似地；直立地
detailed_translations.english: If a person or animal bolts, they suddenly start to run very fast, often because something has frightened them

sentences.english: Marsha was quite casual about appearing on TV.
