sentences.chinese: 随便的谈话

sentences.english: He made some casual remark (= one without thinking much about it ) about her holiday.
sentences.chinese: 他随口提到了她度假的事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 漫不经心的，随便的；偶然的
detailed_translations.english: relaxed and not worried, or seeming not to care about something

name: diagonal
trans: adj. 斜的；对角线的；斜纹的 n. 对角线；斜线

sentences.english: Next, move to the diagonal section at the back-right side of the diamond.
sentences.chinese: 下一个,在钻石的背面-正确的边移到对角线的区段。

sentences.english: And then there is this group of about half a dozen right down the diagonal middle.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一个包含六个元素的元素组,在周期表的对角线的中部。

sentences.english: The average reader reads about 240 words per minute, where as a diagonal reader ‘reads’ (actually scans) closer to 15 words per second or about 900 words per minute.
sentences.chinese: 一般读者每分钟阅读240字，而作为一个对角线读者的“阅读速度”（到不如说是浏览）接近每秒15字或大约每分钟900字。

name: ore
trans: n. 矿；矿石 n. (Ore)人名；(意、瑞典)奥雷；(英)奥尔

sentences.english: iron ore
sentences.chinese: 铁矿石

sentences.english: veins of rich ore
sentences.chinese: 富矿脉

detailed_translations.english: rock or earth from which metal can be obtained

name: freedom
trans: n. 自由，自主；直率 n. (Freedom)人名；(英)弗里德姆

sentences.english: People here like their freedom and privacy.
sentences.chinese: 这里的人喜欢他们所拥有的自由与隐私权。

sentences.english: the rights and freedoms of citizens
sentences.chinese: 公民的权利与自由

sentences.english: the freedom to vote
sentences.chinese: 选举自由

sentences.english: He thinks children have too much freedom these days.
sentences.chinese: 他认为如今的孩子太自由了。

detailed_translations.english: the right to do what you want without being controlled or restricted by anyone

name: independence
trans: n. 独立性，自立性；自主

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

name: liberty
trans: n. 自由；许可；冒失 n. (Liberty)人名；(英)利伯蒂

sentences.english: the fight for liberty and equality
sentences.chinese: 争取自由和平等的斗争

detailed_translations.english: the freedom and the right to do whatever you want without asking permission or being afraid of authority

name: statue
trans: n. 雕像，塑像 vt. 以雕像装饰

sentences.english: Churchill’s statue stands outside the parliament building.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔的塑像矗立在议会大厦外。

sentences.english: A bronze statue was erected in his honour.
sentences.chinese: 人们立了一座铜像纪念他。

detailed_translations.english: an image of a person or animal that is made in solid material such as stone or metal and is usually large

name: tablet
trans: n. 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑 vt. 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

name: torch
trans: n. 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物 vi. 像火炬一样燃烧 vt. 用火炬点燃

sentences.english: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物
detailed_translations.english: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand

name: confused
trans: adj. 困惑的；混乱的；糊涂的 v. 困惑（confuse的过去式）

name: curious
trans: adj. 好奇的，有求知欲的；古怪的；爱挑剔的

sentences.english: Puppies are naturally curious.
sentences.chinese: 小狗天生好奇。

sentences.english: He felt a curious mixture of excitement and panic.
sentences.chinese: 他有一种既兴奋又惊慌的奇怪感觉。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to know about something

name: rumble
trans: vt. 使隆隆响；低沉地说 vi. 隆隆作响 n. 隆隆声；抱怨声 n. (Rumble)人名；(英)朗布尔

sentences.english: The sky, swollen like a black bladder, rumbled and crackled.
sentences.chinese: 天空胀得像个黑色的气囊，发出隆隆声和劈啪声。

detailed_translations.english: If something rumbles, it makes a low, continuous noise
a series of long low sounds

name: village
trans: n. 村庄；村民；（动物的）群落

sentences.english: a little fishing village
sentences.chinese: 一座小渔村

detailed_translations.english: a very small town in the countryside

name: warmth
trans: n. 温暖；热情；激动

sentences.english: the warmth of the summer sun
sentences.chinese: 夏天太阳的暖意

sentences.english: the warmth of her smile
sentences.chinese: 她微笑中的热情

detailed_translations.english: the heat something produces, or when you feel warm

name: worry
trans: v. （使）担心,（使）发愁；骚扰，烦扰；撕咬（动物） n. 担心；让人发愁的事（或人）

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

name: glucose
trans: n. 葡萄糖；葡糖（等于dextrose）

sentences.english: Now, if the insulin "key" cannot open up the cell to glucose, there is something interfering with it.
sentences.chinese: 现在，如果胰岛素这把“钥匙”无法打开细胞让葡萄糖进入，一定是有东西干扰。

sentences.english: Identifying the presence of brown fat is one thing, but activating it to burn more glucose is another.
sentences.chinese: 确定棕色脂肪的存在是一回事，但激活它让它燃烧更多葡萄糖是另一回事。

sentences.english: But refined carbohydrates, such as white bread and white rice, can be very quickly broken down to glucose, the primary fuel for the body.
sentences.chinese: 但是精制的碳水化合物，例如白面包或白米，可以十分迅速地分解为葡萄糖，提供身体最根本的燃料；

detailed_translations.english: a natural form of sugar that exists in fruit

name: homemade
trans: adj. 自制的，家里做的；国产的

sentences.english: homemade cake
sentences.chinese: 自制的蛋糕

detailed_translations.english: made at home and not bought from a shop

name: ingredient
trans: n. 原料；要素；组成部分 adj. 构成组成部分的

sentences.english: Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

name: prepared
trans: adj. 准备好的 v. 准备（prepare的过去分词）

name: strain
trans: n. 张力；拉紧；负担；扭伤；血缘 vi. 拉紧；尽力 vt. 拉紧；滥用；滤去；竭力 n. (Strain)人名；(英)斯特兰 n. （植物、动物的）品种；种类

sentences.english: I’ve strained a muscle in my leg.
sentences.chinese: 我的腿有一处肌肉拉伤。

sentences.english: You’ll strain your eyes trying to read in this light.
sentences.chinese: 在这样的光线下看书会伤眼睛的。

detailed_translations.english: to injure a muscle or part of your body by using it too much or making it work too hard
to try very hard to do something using all your strength or ability

name: budge
trans: vi. 挪动；微微移动；改变态度或意见；服从 vt. 使让步；移动；使改变态度或意见 n. 羔羊皮 n. (Budge)人名；(英)巴奇

sentences.english: She leaned on the door, but it wouldn’t budge.
sentences.chinese: 她靠在门上，但是门纹丝不动。

sentences.english: The horse refused to budge an inch .
sentences.chinese: 那匹马寸步都不肯走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 挪动；微微移动；改变态度或意见；服从
detailed_translations.english: to move, or to make someone or something move

name: conversation
trans: n. 交谈，会话；社交；交往，交际；会谈；（人与计算机的）人机对话

sentences.english: a telephone conversation
sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.english: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.english: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.english: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.english: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.english: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.english: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.english: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

detailed_translations.english: an informal talk in which people exchange news, feelings, and thoughts

name: exhale
trans: vt. 呼气；发出；发散；使蒸发 vi. 呼气；发出；发散

sentences.english: Take a deep breath, then exhale slowly.
sentences.chinese: 深吸一口气，然后慢慢呼出。

detailed_translations.english: to breathe air, smoke etc out of your mouth

name: inhale
trans: vt. 吸入；猛吃猛喝 vi. 吸气

sentences.english: It is dangerous to inhale ammonia fumes.
sentences.chinese: 吸入氨气是很危险的。

sentences.english: Myra lit another cigarette and inhaled deeply  (= breathed in a lot of smoke ).
sentences.chinese: 迈拉又点上一支烟，深深地吸了一口。

detailed_translations.english: to breathe in air, smoke, or gas

name: sob
trans: vi. 啜泣，呜咽；（风等）发出呜咽声 vt. 哭诉，啜泣 n. 啜泣，呜咽

sentences.english: He began sobbing uncontrollably .
sentences.chinese: 他不由自主地抽噎起来。

sentences.english: Her sobs grew louder.
sentences.chinese: 她的呜咽声变得更大了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 啜泣，呜咽；（风等）发出呜咽声
detailed_translations.english: to cry noisily while breathing in short sudden bursts
A sob is one of the noises that you make when you are crying

name: tremble
trans: vi. 发抖；战栗；焦虑；摇晃 vt. 使挥动；用颤抖的声音说出 n. 颤抖；战栗；摇晃

sentences.english: His lip started to tremble and then he started to cry.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴唇开始颤抖，接着就哭了起来。

sentences.english: I will never forget the look on the patient's face, the tremble in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 我将永远不会忘记那病人脸上的表情和他颤抖的手。

detailed_translations.english: to shake slightly in a way that you cannot control, especially because you are upset or frightened
Tremble is also a noun

name: emperor
trans: n. 皇帝，君主

sentences.english: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.english: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

sentences.english: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.chinese: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

detailed_translations.english: the man who is the ruler of an empire

name: empress
trans: n. 皇后；女皇

sentences.english: In today’s painting, we can almost touch the texture of the dress and the cloth of the empress…. However, Veronese is not only known for his technique but also for the use of the color.
sentences.chinese: 时至今日，当我们观看这幅画时，还是几乎可以触及皇后衣裙上的纹理……然而，委罗内塞不只因其绘画技巧为人所知，他对色彩的运用也闻名于世。

detailed_translations.english: a female ruler of an empire, or the wife of an emperor

name: grounds
trans: n. 根据，理由（ground的复数形式）；基础；地面；运动场地 v. 把…放在地上；把…建立在牢固的基础上；上底色（ground的第三人称单数）

name: imperial
trans: adj. 帝国的；皇帝的；至高无上的；威严的 n. 纸张尺寸；特等品 n. (Imperial)人名；(西)因佩里亚尔

sentences.english: Britain’s imperial expansion in the 19th century
sentences.chinese: 19世纪英帝国的扩张

detailed_translations.english: relating to an empire or to the person who rules it

name: species
trans: n. [生物] 物种；种类 adj. 物种上的

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: atmosphere
trans: n. 气氛；大气；空气

sentences.english: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that an event or place gives you

name: damage
trans: n. 损害；损毁；赔偿金 vi. 损害；损毁 vt. 损害，毁坏

sentences.english: insects that damage crops
sentences.chinese: 破坏庄稼的昆虫

sentences.english: There may be permanent brain damage.
sentences.chinese: 可能有永久性脑损伤。

detailed_translations.english: to cause physical harm to something or to part of someone’s body
physical harm that is done to something or to a part of someone’s body, so that it is broken or injured

name: funnel
trans: n. 漏斗；漏斗状物；烟囱 v. （使）流经狭窄空间；通过漏斗将……导入；（使）通过漏斗般输送；形成漏斗状；（使）汇集，传送

sentences.english: ...a ship with three masts and two funnels.
sentences.chinese: …一艘有3根桅杆和2个烟囱的轮船。

detailed_translations.english: a thin tube with a wide top that you use for pouring liquid into a container with a narrow opening, such as a bottle

detailed_translations.chinese: 通过漏斗或烟囱等；使成漏斗形

name: moist
trans: adj. 潮湿的；多雨的；含泪的 n. 潮湿

sentences.english: Make sure the soil is moist before planting the seeds.
sentences.chinese: 播种之前要确保土壤湿润。

sentences.english: a rich, moist chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 香浓软润的巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: warm moist air
sentences.chinese: 温暖湿润的空气

sentences.english: Her eyes were moist (= she was almost crying ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的眼睛湿润了。

detailed_translations.english: slightly wet, especially in a way that is pleasant or suitable

name: strike
trans: v. 撞击；打；踢（球等）；突击；罢工；使打动；侵袭；突然想到；照射；击出（火星）；擦（火柴）；触发（电弧）；鸣；弹奏；开采出；行进；铸造（硬币）；（电影摄影术）复刻；达到（平衡）；（金融）结算；闯出新的事业；撤（营）；给……印象；把……迷住；摆出（姿态） n. 罢工；抗拒；袭击；殴打；（体育中得分的）击球；（十柱保龄球）一投全倒；（尤指石油的）发现；打击；（对上钩的鱼）急拉钓线；（投球）未击中；（投出的）好球；败坏名声的事 n. (Strike) （美、俄、秘）斯特赖克（人名）

sentences.english: The government has promised that the army will be called in to help if there is a firemen’s strike.
sentences.chinese: 政府承诺，如消防员罢工，就将调军队来协助。

detailed_translations.english: a period of time when a group of workers deliberately stop working because of a disagreement about pay, working conditions etc

name: tornado
trans: n. [气象] 龙卷风；旋风；暴风；大雷雨 n. (Tornado)人名；(西)托纳多

sentences.english: The tornado rubbished the whole village.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风毁掉了整个村庄。

sentences.english: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.english: The tornado is coming, so we had better batten down the hatches here and get to the cellar.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风即将来临，因此我们最好把这里的舱口封上，到地下室去。

detailed_translations.english: an extremely violent storm consisting of air that spins very quickly and causes a lot of damage

name: cable car
trans: （美）缆车

sentences.english: "No cable car, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “没有缆车的。” 他说。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that hangs from a moving cable, and is used to take people up and down mountains

name: festivity
trans: n. 欢庆，欢宴；庆典；欢乐

sentences.english: The festivities started with a procession through the town.
sentences.chinese: 庆祝活动以全城巡游开场。

detailed_translations.english: things such as drinking, eating, or dancing that are done to celebrate a special occasion

name: Olympics
trans: n. 奥林匹克运动会 奥林匹克运动会的

name: Portuguese
trans: adj. 葡萄牙的；葡萄牙人的；葡萄牙语的 n. 葡萄牙人；葡萄牙语

name: stadium
trans: n. 体育场；露天大型运动场

sentences.english: the new Olympic Stadium
sentences.chinese: 新的奥林匹克体育场

detailed_translations.chinese: 体育场；露天大型运动场
detailed_translations.english: a building for public events, especially sports and large rock music concerts, consisting of a playing field surrounded by rows of seats

name: handle
trans: v. （用手）触摸；以手（或前臂）触球；操纵（车辆）；（车辆）按特定方式作出反应；处理；对付（某人或某事）；有办法应付；经营；接受（或经营）赃物；泰然承受；（车辆容易或难以）驾驶；运送（货物） n. （门的）把手；柄；（织物等的）手感；（非正式）（人或地方的）称呼；（非正式）赌注总额

sentences.english: I handled most of the paperwork.
sentences.chinese: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.english: The case is being handled by a top lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.english: The finance department handles all the accounts.
sentences.chinese: 财务部处理所有账目。

sentences.english: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.chinese: 计算机能处理大量数据。

detailed_translations.english: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job

name: manners
trans: n. 礼貌（manner的复数形式） n. (Manners)人名；(英、瑞典)曼纳斯

sentences.english: You should be ashamed of your bad manners.
sentences.chinese: 你应该对自己的不礼貌感到羞耻。

name: pour
trans: v. 灌，倒；倾泻；（雨）倾盆而下；涌进，涌出；斟（饮料）；纷至沓来 n. 灌，注；倾泻；倾盆大雨 n. (Pour)（美、捷）保尔（人名）

sentences.english: She poured coffee for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 她为每个人都倒了咖啡。

detailed_translations.english: to make a liquid or other substance flow out of or into a container by holding it at an angle
if a lot of liquid or smoke pours out, it comes out from somewhere in very large amounts

name: whistle
trans: n. 口哨；汽笛；呼啸声；一套衣服；一手同花色牌 v. 吹口哨；发啸叫声；吹哨示意；鸣汽笛；呼啸而行

sentences.english: The lifeguard blew his whistle.
sentences.chinese: 救生员吹响哨子。

sentences.english: Adam whistled happily on his way to work.
sentences.chinese: 亚当在上班路上愉快地吹着口哨。

detailed_translations.english: a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it
to make a high or musical sound by blowing air out through your lips

name: countryside
trans: n. 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民

sentences.english: The house had lovely views over open countryside .
sentences.chinese: 这房子望出去是开阔的乡村美景。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农村，乡下；乡下的全体居民
detailed_translations.english: land that is outside cities and towns

name: disappear
trans: vi. 消失；失踪；不复存在 vt. 使…不存在；使…消失

sentences.english: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.english: The two girls disappeared while walking home from school..
sentences.chinese: 这两名女孩在放学回家的路上失踪了。

detailed_translations.english: to become impossible to see any longer

name: explosion
trans: n. 爆炸；爆发；激增 n. （Explosion）《引爆者》（一部中国动作、犯罪电影）。

sentences.english: We heard a loud explosion.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到一声巨大的爆炸声。

sentences.english: It was an explosion of anger against the practices of the occupying forces.
sentences.chinese: 这是人们不满占领军行为而爆发的怒火。

detailed_translations.english: the act of deliberately causing sth to explode

name: platform
trans: n. 平台；月台，站台；坛；讲台

sentences.english: The Edinburgh train will depart from platform six.
sentences.chinese: 开往爱丁堡的火车将从六号站台发车。

sentences.english: a small raised platform at one end of the room
sentences.chinese: 房间一端凸起的小讲台

sentences.english: an oil exploration platform
sentences.chinese: 石油勘探平台

detailed_translations.english: the raised place beside a railway track where you get on and off a train in a station

name: vacation
trans: n. 假期；（房屋）搬出 vi. 休假，度假

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: explore
trans: vt. 探索；探测；探险 vi. 探索；探测；探险

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 探险， 探索； 仔细查阅， 探究
detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

name: moon
trans: n. 月亮；月球；月光；卫星 vi. 闲荡；出神 vt. 虚度 n. (Moon)人名；(瑞典)莫恩；(柬)蒙；(英)穆恩；(缅)孟

sentences.english: the craters on the surface of the moon
sentences.chinese: 月球表面的环形山

sentences.english: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 美国人于1969年登上月球。

sentences.english: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 月亮从云后钻了出来。

sentences.english: The moon rose into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月亮升上天空。

sentences.english: The moon was shining in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月儿当空照。

sentences.english: the moons of Saturn
sentences.chinese: 土星的卫星

detailed_translations.english: the round object that you can see shining in the sky at night, and that moves around the Earth every 28 days

name: planet
trans: n. 行星 n. (Planet)人名；(法)普拉内；(西、葡)普拉内特

sentences.english: The picture shows six of the nine planets in the solar system.
sentences.chinese: 这张图片展示太阳系9个行星中的6个行星。

detailed_translations.english: A planet is a large, round object in space that moves around a star. The Earth is a planet.

name: ring
trans: n. 戒指；环状物；圆形；圆形竞技场（或表演场）； 炉口；（非法的）团伙；铃声；（鸟的）腿环；行星光环；环形护城工事；肛门；围成一圈的人（或物）；感觉 v. 打电话；发出铃声；回响；充满；嗡嗡作响；（通过按铃）要求服务；听上去（有某种印象）；报（时）；包围；圈起来 n. (Ring) （美、挪、德、爱、英、波、丹）林（人名）

detailed_translations.english: a small square area surrounded by ropes, where people  box  or  wrestle

name: solar system
trans: [天] 太阳系

sentences.english: Why do scientists think something could be hidden beyond the edge of our solar system?
sentences.chinese: 为什么科学家认为可能有某种东西潜藏在太阳系的边缘？

detailed_translations.english: the Sun and the  planets  that go around it

name: spacecraft
trans: n. [航] 宇宙飞船，航天器

sentences.english: the world's largest and most expensive unmanned spacecraft
sentences.chinese: 世界上最大、最贵的无人航天器

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that is able to travel in space

name: capital
trans: n. 首都，省会；资金；大写字母；资本家 adj. 首都的；重要的；大写的 n. (Capital)人名；(法)卡皮塔尔

sentences.english: capital investments
sentences.chinese: 资本投资

detailed_translations.english: relating to money that you use to start a business or to make more money

name: Congress
trans: n. 国会；代表大会；会议；社交

name: court
trans: n. 法院；球场；朝廷；奉承 vt. 招致（失败、危险等）；向…献殷勤；设法获得 vi. 求爱 n. (Court)人名；(英)考特；(法)库尔

sentences.english: It could not be proved in a court of law.
sentences.chinese: 这无法在法庭上证实。

sentences.english: The court case lasted six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼持续了六个星期。

sentences.english: Four people will appear in court today, charged with fraud.
sentences.chinese: 今天将有四个人因被指控犯有欺诈罪出庭受审。

sentences.english: The court ruled that no compensation was due.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判决不予赔偿。

sentences.english: She threatened to take the magazine to court (= take legal action against them ) if they didn’t publish an immediate apology.
sentences.chinese: 她威胁说如果这家杂志不立刻刊登道歉声明，她就要把他们告上法庭。

detailed_translations.english: the place where a trial is held, or the people there, especially the judge and the jury who examine the evidence and decide whether someone is guilty or not guilty

name: gallery
trans: n. 画廊；走廊；旁听席；地道 vt. 在…修建走廊；在…挖地道 vi. 挖地道 n. (Gallery)人名；(英)加勒里

sentences.english: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.english: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

detailed_translations.english: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art

name: monument
trans: n. 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品 vt. 为…树碑

sentences.english: He erected a monument on the spot where his daughter was killed.
sentences.chinese: 他在女儿遇难的地方立了块纪念碑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品
detailed_translations.english: a building,  statue  , or other large structure that is built to remind people of an important event or famous person

name: change
trans: v. 改变，转变，（使）不同；（使）变换；替代，更换；交换；货币兑换；将……换成零钱；退还 n. 变化，改变；替代物；换洗衣物；零钱，硬币；换乘；全新体验；新月相的出现

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

name: chlorophyll
trans: n. [植][生化] 叶绿素

sentences.english: The chlorophyll in wheatgrass also helps to purify the liver.
sentences.chinese: 麦草中的叶绿素同样可以帮助净化肝脏。

sentences.english: Wheatgrass has antibiotic properties and is packed with chlorophyll as it is a plant.
sentences.chinese: 麦草含有抗生素，由于它是一种植物，所以含有许多叶绿素。

sentences.english: This could be estimated at 1000 litres of hydrogen for 330 grams of chlorophyll per day whereas for example colza produces roughly only 1000 litres of oil per hectare . . .
sentences.chinese: 这种农场每天估计能够产生1000升氢气，而且只消耗330克叶绿素； 而比如种植菜籽，每公顷土地才能产生大约1000升油。

detailed_translations.english: the green-coloured substance in plants

name: fall
trans: v. 落下；跌倒；下垂；跪下；（地面）向下倾斜；（数量等的）减少；  （雨或雪） 降落；沦陷； 阵亡；进入（某状态）；突然来到 n. 落下；跌倒；（雪、岩石等的）降落；（数量等的）减少；秋季；垮台、衰败 adj. 秋天的 n. (Fall) （西）法勒（人名）

sentences.english: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.english: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.chinese: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.english: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

sentences.english: She flushed and her eyes fell (= she looked down ) .
sentences.chinese: 她脸一红，垂下了眼帘。

detailed_translations.english: to move or drop down from a higher position to a lower position

name: leaves
trans: n. 树叶，叶片；花瓣；（纸）页，张；薄金属片；活动桌板，折叠桌板；（窗、门等）扇；空心墙的内面（或外面）（leaf 的复数） v. 离开；让……留下（leave 的第三人称单数）

name: photosynthesis
trans: n. 光合作用

sentences.english: It has at least one gene necessary for photosynthesis—so far it’s the only animal known with this ability.
sentences.chinese: 它有至少一个基因是光合作用所必需的——到目前为止这是唯一被发现具有此项能力的动物。

sentences.english: The belt of vegetation that crosses Africa below the Sahara is very dark because most of the sunlight is absorbed by plants for photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 在撒哈拉沙漠下方，横贯非洲中部的植被带颜色非常深，因为植物由于光合作用吸收了大多数太阳光。

sentences.english: As the ocean warms, it becomes more stratified, with the warmer water remaining at the top where the organisms need to be in order to do photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 但是随着海水变暖，它的层次会更加分明，温度更高的海水会停留在表面，而这里正是生物体进行光合作用必需的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the production by a green plant of special substances like sugar that it uses as food, caused by the action of sunlight on  chlorophyll (= the green substance in leaves )

name: castings
trans: n. [机] 铸件；铸造物（casting的复数）

name: cocoon
trans: n. 茧；卵囊 vt. 把……紧紧包住

sentences.english: ...like a butterfly emerging from a cocoon.
sentences.chinese: …好似蝴蝶破茧而出。

detailed_translations.english: a silk cover that young  moths  and other insects make to protect themselves while they are growing

name: mate
trans: n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 n. (Mate)人名；(日)蛏(姓)；(西、意、塞)马特；(波黑)马特；(罗、俄)马泰

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

name: mucus
trans: n. 粘液；黏液

name: muscle
trans: n. 肌肉；力量 vt. 加强；使劲搬动；使劲挤出 vi. 使劲行进

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

name: soil
trans: n. 土地；土壤；国家；粪便；务农；温床 vt. 弄脏；污辱 vi. 变脏

sentences.english: She moistenend  the soil round the plant.
sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

detailed_translations.english: to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body
to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

name: herd
trans: n. 兽群，畜群；放牧人 vi. 成群，聚在一起 vt. 放牧；使成群 n. (Herd)人名；(英、芬)赫德

sentences.english: Chobe is also renowned for its large herds of elephant and buffalo.
sentences.chinese: 乔贝还以其大群的大象和水牛而闻名。

sentences.english: It was Tom’s duty to herd the cows.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的职责是放牛。

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals of one kind that live and feed together
to make animals move together in a group

name: mustang
trans: n. 野马（产于墨西哥和北美平原）；海军行伍出身的军官（美国俚语）

name: plains
trans: n. 平地，平原（plain的复数）

name: sanctuary
trans: n. 避难所；至圣所；耶路撒冷的神殿

sentences.english: His church became a sanctuary for thousands of people who fled the civil war.
sentences.chinese: 他的教堂成了数千逃避内战的人们的一个避难所。

detailed_translations.chinese: 避难所；至圣所；耶路撒冷的神殿
detailed_translations.english: a peaceful place that is safe and provides protection, especially for people who are in danger

name: enemy
trans: n. 敌人，仇敌；敌军 adj. 敌人的，敌方的

sentences.english: She’s a dangerous enemy to have.
sentences.chinese: 与她为敌很危险。

sentences.english: Cats and dogs have always been natural enemies.
sentences.chinese: 猫和狗向来是天敌。

sentences.english: an old enemy of her father
sentences.chinese: 她父亲的一个宿敌

sentences.english: the unforgettable sight of the president shaking hands with his sworn enemy
sentences.chinese: 董事长与其死敌握手的难忘情景

sentences.english: I wouldn’t wishthis on my worst enemy.
sentences.chinese: 即使是我的死对头，我也不愿看到他发生这样的事情。

detailed_translations.english: someone who hates you and wants to harm you

name: relative
trans: adj. 相对的；有关系的；成比例的 n. 亲戚；相关物；[语] 关系词；亲缘植物

sentences.english: The relative merits of both approaches have to be considered.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.english: You may think you’re poor, but it’s all relative (= you are not poor compared to some people ) .
sentences.chinese: 你可能认为自己很穷，但一切都是相对的。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality when compared with something else
a member of your family

name: warning
trans: n. 警告；预兆；预告 adj. 警告的；引以为戒的 v. 警告（warn的ing形式） n. (Warning)人名；(德)瓦宁

sentences.english: a warning that grey squirrels are threatening the existence of red squirrels
sentences.chinese: 关于灰松鼠正威胁到红松鼠生存的警告

detailed_translations.english: something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it
